name: Enlisted Warrior
description:
A Top-Down Shooter, based on a foreign planet, with the prime objective to eliminate foes and reach the extraction point with both interchangeable characters alive.

Having an original theme of being off-planet and being based off of an old-school ‘shoot ‘em up’ retro game, Enlisted Warrior contains several unique gameplay elements. This title consistently provides the player with opportunities through unique and intuitive abilities to use throughout gameplay elements. Tactically taking advantage of each of the presented abilities, will allow the player to avoid damage, eliminate foes efficiently, discover new environmental areas, alongside solving simple puzzles to unlock new locations around the level, staying true to a retro style of game; being simplistic yet very effective.
